resources.string: So you think you know Berlin?
Hello!\n\nThanks for joining in our little quiz about Berlin. At the end you will know if you are a real Berliner. But please tell us your nickname first.
Tell us your nickname first, please."
1. Let\'s start easy. Berlin is pretty old. But when was it founded exactly?
2. Berlin is known as a shelter for minorities, refugees and ostracized groups. Some left a strong mark that can be still witnessed today. Which influences can be still found? Check all that apply.
3. Although not widely known, Berliners made remarkable inventions and scientific breakthroughs. Which things were invented here? Check all that apply.
4. After the second world war Berlin was separated into east and west. Do you know which nations administrated the eastern part? Check all that apply.
5. In the 70\'s and 80\'s West-Berlin became a hot spot for alternative living and a vibrant art spot. Which artists worked lived in Berlin at this time? Check all that apply.
6. After the German reunification Berlin struggled for a long time finding it\'s new role. A former mayor summarized Berlins uniqueness in one expression. Which one?
7. Music is strongly tied to Berlin. In which famous clubs can you dance the night away (once youâ€™re in)?
8. How many people call Berlin a home in 2018?
9. Today, Berlin again hosts a vibrant, innovative start-up scene. Which companies have their headquarters in the city?
10. What are you waiting for? When are you coming for a visit?
Visiting? I am going to stay!
